xxl.core.math.functions

Class SplineCompressedFunctionAggregateFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • xxl.core.math.functions.AggregationFunction
      • xxl.core.math.functions.SplineCompressedFunctionAggregateFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, OnlineAggregation

    public class SplineCompressedFunctionAggregateFunction
extends AggregationFunction
implements OnlineAggregation
    This class provides a compression algorithm based upon the approximation of real-valued one-dimensional functions by a cubic Bezier-Spline interpolate used as an aggregation function for online aggregation of given numerical data without any error control. One is able to reduce the required memory to store a real-valued function as a result of a aggregation step by substituting the function by an approximating cubic Bezier-Spline interpolate with the first boundary condition.

    Unlike aggregation functions provided by ConfidenceAggregationFunction objects of this class don't compute confidence intervals for the processed data. Furthermore, this class implements the interface given by OnlineAggregation. This interface provides special functionality of aggregation functions by supporting online features like watching and controlling . See OnlineAggregation for further details.

    Objects of this type are recommended for the usage with aggregator cursors!


    This class shows how one can use an estimation function as an aggregate function using the aggregator cursor. Functions used in the context of online aggregation must support two-figured function calls. Each aggregation function must support a function call of the following type:
    agg_n = f (agg_n-1, next),
    where agg_n denotes the computed aggregation value after n steps, f the aggregation function, agg_n-1 the computed aggregation value after n-1 steps, and next the next object to use for computation. An aggregation function delivers only null as aggregation result as long as the aggregation function has not yet fully initialized.
    See Also:
    Function, OnlineAggregation, NativeKernelDensityEstimator, Aggregator, CubicBezierSpline, RB1CubicBezierSpline, Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected double a
      left interval border to evaluate the given function and also the support of the splines to build
      protected double b
      right interval border to evaluate the given function and also the support of the splines to build
      protected Predicate buildup
      used predicate to determine when to build up a new spline
      protected boolean cdfMode
      Indicates built splines will be in cdf mode, i.e., evaluating the spline at x > maximum causes the spline to return 1.0 instead of 0.0.
      protected AggregationFunction function
      aggregation function delivering real-valued one-dimensional functions
      protected double[] grid
      used grid for evaluating the function
      protected Function gridPoints
      function determining the grid points
      protected boolean initialized
      indicates whether the internally used estimator function is initialized or not
      protected Function maximum
      function delivering the right border
      protected Function minimum
      function delivering the left border
      protected int n
      number of steps used to build the spline for compression
      protected Object na
      function to compress, delivered by function
      protected CubicBezierSpline spline
      internally built spline

      • cdfMode

        protected boolean cdfMode
        Indicates built splines will be in cdf mode, i.e., evaluating the spline at x > maximum causes the spline to return 1.0 instead of 0.0. That is necessary for the approximation of a cumulative distribution function.

      • minimum

        protected Function minimum
        function delivering the left border

      • maximum

        protected Function maximum
        function delivering the right border

      • gridPoints

        protected Function gridPoints
        function determining the grid points

    • Method Detail

      • invoke

        public Object invoke(Object old,
                     Object next)
        Two-figured function call for supporting aggregation by this function. Each aggregation function must support a function call like agg_n = f (agg_n-1, next), where agg_n denotes the computed aggregation value after n steps, f the aggregation function, agg_n-1 the computed aggregation value after n-1 steps and next the next object to use for computation. This method delivers only null as aggregation result as long as the aggregation has not yet initialized.
        Specified by:
        invoke in class AggregationFunction
        Parameters:
        old - result of the aggregation function in the previous computation step
        next - next object used for computation
        Returns:
        aggregation value after n steps

      • getState

        public Object getState()
        Returns the current status of the online aggregation function implementing the OnlineAggregation interface.
        Specified by:
        getState in interface OnlineAggregation
        Returns:
        current status of this function (here the current function to compress)

      • setState

        public void setState(Object state)
        Sets a new status of the online aggregation function implementing the OnlineAgggregation interface (optional). This method is not supported by this class. It is implemented by throwing an UnsupportedOperationException.
        Specified by:
        setState in interface OnlineAggregation
        Parameters:
        state - current state of the function
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if this method is not supported by this class
